full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THA 'OG CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I GSOL MCHOD MDOR BSDUS RNAM BZHI 'PHRIN BSKUL DPYID KYI PHO NYA'I SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES THA 'OG CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I GSOL MCHOD LAS BZHI'I DGA' TSAL BZHAD PAR BSKUL BA'I DPYID SHES KYIS PHO NYA'I SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA RANG GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN SRID SNYAM NAS CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I DUS CHEN DANG 'BREL RGYAL BA GSUM PA'I NYIN PAR KA SMAD SUM CU LUGS BYUNG LDOG GI RIM PA'I SNGAGS RAM MING TZAM DKON MCHOG BSTAN DAR GYIS SUG BRIS DZA YANTU SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
